scripts.build:cjs: lerna exec --stream -- cross-env BABEL_ENV=build babel src --out-dir dist --config-file ../../babel.config.js --ignore "**/*.story.jsx","**/*.test.jsx" --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
scripts.build:esm: lerna exec --stream -- cross-env BABEL_ENV=build BABEL_MODULES=false babel src --out-dir dist-esm --config-file ../../babel.config.js --ignore "**/*.story.jsx","**/*.test.jsx" --delete-dir-on-start --no-comments
